conversion_verification.notes: The 3D render clearly shows visible wall height, thickness, perceivable interior depth, an angled view, and a cleanly removed roof for interior visibility.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Walls have good height and thickness (5), floors are distinct (3), interior volume is clear (4), and 3D wall corners are geometrically sound (3). The viewing angle is appropriate (5) and interior is visible from an elevated perspective (3). There is minimal perspective distortion (2). The roof is cleanly removed (5) and interior spaces fully visible (3). Some minor broken sections are visible such as the corner wall in the lower left of the render which causes a slight deduction (0/2).

geometric_accuracy.notes: The number of rooms and adjacency relationships are mostly correct (3, 4). Relative room proportions are largely preserved (3). Major room identities can be inferred (2). Most major wall positions align well (4) and wall lengths are proportional (3). Internal partitions are mostly correct (2). Doors are present and on correct walls (4), but windows are partially missing or simplified (1/2). Openings are proportionally sized and oriented, though some windows are completely missing (1/2).

interior_elements.notes: Major furniture is present, including beds and sofas, though some items like wardrobes are missing (3/4). Kitchen elements are present and recognizable (2). Bathroom fixtures are present (2). Furniture is mostly placed in correct rooms (3). Furniture scale seems reasonable (2). Orientation is logical for most items (3/2).

visual_clarity.notes: Walls, floors, and openings are clearly distinguishable (4). Geometry is readable (4). Interior is clearly visible (3) and lighting does not obscure geometry (3). Material usage is consistent (2). No major rendering artifacts (2). The grey background is clean and aids presentation (2).

detected_errors.description: Some windows from the original 2D plan are missing or significantly simplified in the 3D render.

summary: The 3D render represents a good geometric transformation with most architectural elements and furniture accurately depicted, though some minor window and furniture omissions are present.
